description:
This market refers to the Call of Duty match between Miami Heretics and FaZe Vegas in the Call of Duty League Stage 2 Major Qualifiers Qualifiers, scheduled for February 13 at 6:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "FaZe Vegas" if FaZe Vegas wins 3 or more games than Miami Heretics in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Miami Heretics".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Call of Duty match between Miami Heretics and FaZe Vegas in the Call of Duty League Stage 2 Major Qualifiers Qualifiers, scheduled for February 13 at 6:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Miami Heretics" if Miami Heretics win the match against FaZe Vegas.

This market will resolve to "FaZe Vegas" if FaZe Vegas win the match against Miami Heretics.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/callofduty/Main_Page.
